text: Émile Salvi (born 10 September 1936) is a French skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1968 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:French male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of France Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Isère
title: Émile Salvi
